main event: On May 15, 1955, a metallic object was observed moving north over New York City while witnesses were taking pictures of a balloon.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately one and a half minutes,The object appeared to have a metallic appearance,It was tracked by radar at Stewart AFB, confirming high speeds,The sighting involved multiple Air Force officers as witnesses,The object exhibited abrupt changes in direction during the observation.
sighted object: a metallic object in the sky
location: New York City, New York, USA
